使用 **mhchem** 工具渲染漂亮的化学反应式。这个工具有 **MathJax** 扩展，需要额外载入。

``` yaml
format:
  html:
    theme: cosmo
    include-after-body:
        - text: |
              <script src="path/to/tex-mml-chtml.js"></script>
```

在使用时，使用 `\ce{}` 来调用。

## 分子式

参见下面的例子：

$\ce{H2O}$：`$\ce{H2O}$`；

$\ce{Sb2O3}$：`$\ce{Sb2O3}$`

## 电荷

$\ce{H+}$

$\ce{CrO4^2-}$

$\ce{[AgCl2]-}$

$\ce{Y^99+}$

$\ce{Y^{99+}}$

``` latex
$\ce{H+}$
 
$\ce{CrO4^2-}$
 
$\ce{[AgCl2]-}$
 
$\ce{Y^99+}$
 
$\ce{Y^{99+}}$
```

## 化学方程式

$\ce{CO2 + C -> 2 CO}$

`$\ce{CO2 + C -> 2 CO}$`

$\ce{Hg^2+ ->[I-] HgI2 ->[I-] [Hg^{II}I4]^2-}$

`$\ce{Hg^2+ ->[I-] HgI2 ->[I-] [Hg^{II}I4]^2-}$`

:::{.content-visible when-format="pdf"}
$C_p[\ce{H2O(l)}] = \qty{75.3}{\joule\per\mole\per\kelvin}$

`$C_p[\ce{H2O(l)}] = \qty{75.3}{\joule\per\mole\per\kelvin}$`
:::


:::{.content-visible when-format="html"}
$C_p[\ce{H2O(l)}] = \pu{75.3 J // mol K}$

## 同位素

$\ce{^{227}_{90}Th+}$

$\ce{^227_90Th+}$

$\ce{^{0}_{-1}n^{-}}$

$\ce{^0_-1n-}$

``` latex
$\ce{^{227}_{90}Th+}$
 
$\ce{^227_90Th+}$
 
$\ce{^{0}_{-1}n^{-}}$
 
$\ce{^0_-1n-}$
```

## 反应箭头

$\ce{A -> B}$

$\ce{A <- B}$

$\ce{A <--> B}$

$\ce{A <=> B}$

``` latex
$\ce{A -> B}$
 
$\ce{A <- B}$
 
$\ce{A <--> B}$
 
$\ce{A <=> B}$
```

$\ce{A ->[{text above}][{text below}] B}$

`$\ce{A ->[{text above}][{text below}] B}$`
